name: LCSAssetUpload
description: Task to upload assets to the LCS asset library
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Review the Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations [Developer Documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2141947).

inputs.name: serviceConnectionName
inputs.label: LCS Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a Dynamics Lifecycle Services connection to be used

inputs.name: projectId
inputs.label: LCS Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Project Id of the Dynamics Lifecycle Services project to upload into

inputs.name: assetPath
inputs.label: File to upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the file to upload to Dynamics Lifecycle Services

inputs.name: assetName
inputs.label: LCS Asset Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the asset in the Dynamics Lifecycle Services asset library. If left blank, the file name will be used.

inputs.name: assetDescription
inputs.label: LCS Asset Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional description of the asset in the Dynamics Lifecycle Services asset library

inputs.name: waitForValidation
inputs.label: Wait for Validation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option if the task should wait until the asset has been validated

OutputVariables.name: FileAssetId
OutputVariables.description: Output variable containing the file asset ID of the uploaded asset
